name: Artemios
description:
Artemios is a third-person adventure game with themes of Greek mythology that features a turn-based combat system.

Artemios, a solider with power gifted by the Gods, is summoned once more after a century of peace, and is called upon to complete his mission. Slay through monsters, undead, and pigs in this mythological adventure.

This is a tech demo of the game I designed and developed for my third-year at University.
